entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 07 February 2023
